Description.Name: Second Set of Mech Bays
Description.Details: Increases the company's ability to store mechs by enabling the Mech Bay 2 tab to actually store mechs. WITHOUT THIS UPGRADE, MECH BAY 2 DOES NOT HOLD MECHS EVEN THOUGH YOU CAN LOOK AT MECH BAY 2. YOU REQUIRE THIS UPGRADE FOR MECH BAY 2 TO FUNCTION!! PLEASE READ THE FAQ ON MECH BAY 2 ON THE BTA WIKI FOR DETAILS AND LIMITATIONS.

AssignedCastDescription: Turns out the Argo had a second full set of mech bays hidden this whole time, we only found it after opening Mech Bay 3. I think we can double up on our storage space for active mechs with a little elbow grease so just give the word and we'll crack open the extra mech bays!
